title: AbuBhakar
author: AbuBhakar
content: As title implied, I want to request @theymos for a night mode/dark theme to make the forum less stressful since pure white is very stressful in the eye. I didn't notice this on my old monitor but it bothering now when using a wide montor.I notice too that there's a feature to change theme feature on Look and Layout Preferences but it's currently disabled for an unknown reason. I assume this feature is implemented before and just temporarily disabled right?Does any of the old account experienced using that feature before when it's still functional?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on November 16, 2022, 10:59:22 AMAs title implied, I want to request @theymos for a night mode/dark theme to make the forum less stressful since pure white is very stressful in the eye. I didn't notice this on my old monitor but it bothering now when using a wide montor.Install BPIP extension to your browser, it brings a lot of useful stuff. (see more: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5224821 )And you can choose a theme for the forum, there are also two dark options.Imho this is the easiest way to add dark theme to bitcointalk.
